text: Geulah Cohen (, 25 December 1925 â€“ 18 December 2019) was an Israeli politician and activist. She founded the Tehiya party. She won the Israel Prize in 2003. She was born in Tel Aviv. Cohen was a member of Knesset between 1972 and 1992. Cohen died on 18 December 2019 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem alumni Category:Israeli human rights activists Category:Politicians from Tel Aviv
title: Geulah Cohen
